mapper.select: SELECT t.tong_id AS tongId, t.tong_name AS tongName, t.plan_id AS planId FROM tongbtiresult r JOIN tongbti t ON r.tong_id = t.tong_id WHERE r.id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT tong_id FROM tongbti WHERE tong_name = #{tongName}

SELECT t.tong_id AS tongId, t.tong_name AS tongName, t.description AS tongDescription, p.plan_id AS planId, p.name AS planName, p.base_data_gb AS baseDataGb, p.daily_data_gb AS dailyDataGb, p.sharing_data_gb AS sharingDataGb, p.monthly_fee AS monthlyFee, p.voice_call_price AS voiceCallPrice, p.sms AS sms, p.throttle_speed_kbps AS throttleSpeedKbps, p.eligibility AS eligibility, p.mobile_type AS mobileType, p.is_online AS isOnline, p.plan_url AS planUrl, p.telecom_provider AS telecomProvider, p.description AS planDescription FROM tongbti t JOIN plan p ON t.plan_id = p.plan_id WHERE t.tong_name = #{tongName} LIMIT 1
